intro: Elatostema youyangense, commonly known as the Youyang elatostema, is a species of flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the family Urticaceae, which includes nettle plants, and is characterized by its small, clustered flowers and heart-shaped leaves. The plant typically grows in moist, shaded environments such as forests and rocky hillsides. Its leaves are often covered in fine hairs, and it produces small, greenish-white flowers that bloom in the spring. Elatostema youyangense is of interest to botanists due to its unique morphology and limited distribution.
